footer.brandDesc: Promoting Hanfu culture in Ireland. Professional Hanfu experience, rental and sales.
footer.subscribeDesc: Get the latest news and event updates

home.bannerSlogan: Discover the beauty of Hanfu in Ireland
home.aboutDesc: Cloudloom brings authentic Hanfu experience to Ireland. Explore traditional Chinese clothing and culture with us.
home.step1Desc: Browse our collection and pick your favorite style.
home.step2Desc: Select a date and time that suits you.
home.step3Desc: Dress up, enjoy the moment, and take beautiful photos.
home.testimonial1: A wonderful experience! The Hanfu was beautiful and the staff were so friendly.
home.testimonial2: I felt like I traveled back in time. Highly recommended!
home.contactDesc: For booking or inquiries, please contact us:
home.feature1Desc: All costumes are genuine, high-quality Hanfu.
home.feature2Desc: Free professional photo shoot for every guest.
home.feature4Desc: Located in the heart of Dublin, easy to reach.
home.faq1Q: How do I book a Hanfu experience?
home.faq1A: You can book online or contact us directly via email or phone.
home.faq2A: Yes, every experience includes a free professional photo shoot.
home.faq3Q: Can I cancel or reschedule my booking?
home.faq3A: Yes, please contact us at least 24 hours in advance.
